Title: Christmas Trifle
Writer: Josh Thomas, Thomas Ward, Hannah Gadsby (additional writing), Becky Lucas (additional writing)
Actors: Josh Thomas, Debra Lawrance, David Roberts, Renee Lim
Plot: Josh goes all out and hosts Christmas dinner for his parents and his friends. When a few things go awry everyone's flaws come to the forefront and the meal ends with Arnold leaving. Josh heads to the park with just John and a trifle.
